messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We will build a great wall, and make the assistants pay for it

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: How many of us are poor?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: IT IS TIME TO THROW OFF THE SHACKLES OF OPRRESSION! WE WILL RISE UP AGAINST CENTOM! WE WILL DESTROY THE CAPITALISTS! FOR THE UNION! I

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
You guys are really trying to revolt? I swear to my mum if you don't quit it I'll send a shuttle at you or something
Stupid employees

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo if werewolves or Kamryn Pavlov's latest album is your jam make your way to bridge

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SSSo, the cap isss a sssyndi, i sssent to there bassse a quaint messsage of them being the masssive gay, he essscaped and isss now fucking off prolly deep into maint. all of enginnering isss armed to the teath, myssself included. CE isss now acting captain untill the fucker isss caught.
